overview: Wannn is a native Pontianak who finds happiness through playing games. However, growing up in an old-fashioned family, Wannn's parents were against his hobby and side job as a game jockey. Differences of opinion between Wannn and his father caused a major dispute. This also fueled his father's health, so that Wannn lost the opportunity to prove his achievements as a gamer.
title: The Wannn Believe
